@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00236 for Sampling Event EMOBON_NRMCB_So_11
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: Stazione Zoologica Anton Dohrn
Sampling country: Italy
Sampling station lat/long: 40.800139:14.25
Sampling environment: soft_sediment
Sampling station contact name: Raffaella Casotti
Sampling station contact ORCID id: 0000-0002-9876-4601
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB51658

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00236
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_NRMCB_So_11

MetaGOflow run id: HCFCYDSX5.UDI133
